document_data.mainbody:
'''"The Book of Inner Alchemy"''' is a short adventure module for 12{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players fight an order of unscrupulous [[monk]]s in the [[Cloakwood]].
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], several pages are stolen from ''[[The Book of Inner Alchemy]]'', an ancient tome in the [[Great Library]] of [[Candlekeep]]. A group of [[adventurer]]s is tasked with recovering the stolen pages. To do so, they must confront the [[monk]]s of the [[Order of the Immortal Lotus]], and defeat their legendary leader, [[Bak Mei]].
